name: Murder at the Love Throne Six Nine Motel - A Valentine's Day Mystery Murder
name_original: Murder at the Love Throne Six Nine Motel - A Valentine's Day Mystery Murder
description:
Synopsis

On the 14th of February, couples have been attacked in the past five years. Today marks the sixth year since the string of murders with a tallied seven victims. However, I am hot on his trail. I have deduced his crimes to take place in love motels, where couples are known to.. "Make Out." The first is to figure out which town's motel. Then to save the lives from the knife of the killer! For the love of burning and passionate lips, I, Detective Heart will save you! Or else, this sixth year will total nine victims to the Valentine's Day Killer.

 

Word from creator:

If you haven't figured yet, this is a satirical game. If you're looking for something with depth and lore for the Valentine Holiday, then this won't be for you. Last key note: this game was made last minute in approximately 12 hours (thus majorly RTP assets). A final build version will be made later on. You can check out this game's creation video once uploaded in the link below or video on this page. Thanks for checking this game out :)

Warnings:

Recommended for 13+

Mild sexual content & suggestive language

Mild Violence

My YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/TheopolisGaming
